title: Assistant of Superstar
overview: A popular superstar with a bad character and a lack of education, Wang Yuxi is forced to hire an assistant for training, otherwise he will not get the desired role. The place of his assistant is given to a student Wei Chiao - an intelligent, educated girl who treats Wang Yuxi with discontent (which is mutual), is afraid of the crowd and dreams of becoming a teacher since childhood, but receives a bad review about her tutoring platform.
